attributes.action: Grant Surrey independance from the UK
attributes.additional_details:
In light of the referendums in Scotland, Gibraltar and the Falkland Islands regarding independence from the UK, it has become apparent that the government wishes to grant everybody the opportunity to govern themselves.

We, the undersigned, petition the government of the United Kingdom to grant the county of Surrey independence from the United Kingdom, in the event of a no vote, we wish for stronger devolved powers in Surrey county council.
